summary: Big player home with everything you need and more.
descriptionHtml:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuTIJG7fD3k&feature=plcp
video doesnt show newest version content but thanks!

PLEASE ENDORSE AND COMMENT IF YOU LIKE IT, IT HELPS AND MOTIVATES ME ALOT!

---------------FOR THOSE WHO CANT FIND IT HERES A TIP: THALMOR EMBASSY--------------
Dovahkiins mansion, a large playerhome with with low intrerior cells.

I am not best at making descriptions, but i try my best 

Major features---everything may not be listed---

(characters)
-3servants
-trainer enchanter 
-alchemy trainer
-blacksmithing
-guards (about 9)
-few nobles
-few girls (you can choose between naked and nonnaked)
-shipmaster
-2miners


(rooms)
-alchemy room + ingredient room \\\\\\\"garden\\\\\\\" -no interior cell
-enchanting room -no interior cell
-blacksmithing room -interior cell
-big cozy \\\\\\\"swim\\\\\\\" room  + sauna -no interior cell
-2 noble rooms
-secret (well, not anymore) torture chamber
-dovahkiins private room with most of the crafting needs -interior cell
-servants quarters -interior cell
-mines
-docks +ship with interior

lesser features

-your throne 
-player container
-something else, just dont remember now :P

--IS IT LORE-FRIENDLY?--

- i think so.



also note that this mod can contain lot of bugs.

i recommend following mods(no links now)

- Spouses can live everywhere



-I dont recommend using nmm as i havent tested it 

v1.1 
-added mines
-added docks with ship, and ship has small interior
author: lati100 or 1 inch punch
